channel.title: how many player??
channel.description: So how many players do you think BMS will have on steam when it is released? Think it will go over 3000 players ?

item.title: how many player??
item.dc:creator: etb513
item.description:
I would estimate a power level of over 9000. I mean player level. Yeah.

Seriously though, it should be a fair amount of players and it will continue to grow as people hear about it.

The trailer got massive attention on digg. My guess is if we can get the launch announcement spread through social media sites like that we can exponentially increase the amount of people interested.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: how many player??
item.dc:creator: DKR1138
item.description:
Counter Stike, Team Fortress and Day of Defeat are multiplayer games, they where purchased because they where deemed as essential by Multiplayer gamers. Its something that can be continuously sold, continuously updated and continuously played.

Now while that isn’t a jab at Black Mesa in any form, it isn’t the Single Player game of the re-created Half-Life that would be a basis of Valves interest*… now if the Multiplayer component is just as well crafted, fun and exciting that im hoping the single player to be then there would be foundation to speculate as much.

*Valve of course are interested in the Single Player, but they’re also interested in keeping fans and community happy also.

Read full topic
